parameters.name: AutoPay
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to automatically renew the DTS instance when it expires. Valid values:

*   **false**: does not automatically renew the DTS instance when it expires. This is the default value.
*   **true**: automatically renews the DTS instance when it expires.

parameters.name: BuyCount
parameters.description:
The subscription length.

*   If the **Period** parameter is set to **Year**, the value range is **1** to **5**.
*   If the **Period** parameter is set to **Month**, the value range is **1** to **60**.

>  You must specify this parameter only if you set the **ChargeType** parameter to **PrePaid**.

parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The new billing method. Valid values:

*   **PrePaid**: subscription.
*   **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data synchronization or change tracking task. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the task ID.

parameters.name: InstanceClass
parameters.description:
The new instance class of the DTS instance. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobDetail](~~208925~~) operation to query the original instance class of the DTS instance.

*   DTS supports the following instance classes for a data migration instance: **xxlarge**, **xlarge**, **large**, **medium**, and **small**.
*   DTS supports the following instance classes for a data synchronization instance: **large**, **medium**, **small**, and **micro**.

> For more information about the test performance of each instance class, see [Specifications of data migration instances](~~26606~~) and [Specifications of data synchronization channels](~~26605~~).

parameters.name: MaxDu
parameters.description:
The maximum number of DUs in a serverless instance. Valid values: 2, 4, 8, and 16.

>  This feature is not supported. Do not specify this parameter.

parameters.name: MinDu
parameters.description:
The minimum number of DTS Units (DUs) in a serverless instance. Valid values: 1, 2, 4, 8, and 16.

>  This feature is not supported. Do not specify this parameter.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The billing cycle of the subscription instance. Valid values:

*   **Year**
*   **Month** (default value)

>  You must specify this parameter only if you set the **ChargeType** parameter to **PrePaid**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the DTS instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).
